verses.verse: Judge <S%G2919><s%> not, that you be not judged. <S%G2919><s%>

For with what <S%G3739><s%> judgment <S%G2917><s%> you judge, <S%G2919><s%> you shall be judged: <S%G2919><s%> and with what <S%G3739><s%> measure <S%G3358><s%> you mete, <S%G3354><s%> it shall be measured <S%G488><s%> to you again. <S%G488><s%>

And why <S%G5101><s%> behold <S%G991><s%> you the mote <S%G2595><s%> that is in your brother's <S%G80><s%> eye, <S%G3788><s%> but consider <S%G2657><s%> not the beam <S%G1385><s%> that is in your <S%G4674><s%> own eye? <S%G3788><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> will you say <S%G2046><s%> to your brother, <S%G80><s%> Let <S%G863><s%> me pull <S%G1544><s%> out the mote <S%G2595><s%> out of your <S%G4675><s%> eye; <S%G3788><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a beam <S%G1385><s%> is in your <S%G4675><s%> own eye? <S%G3788><s%>

You hypocrite, <S%G5273><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out the beam <S%G1385><s%> out of your <S%G4675><s%> own eye; <S%G3788><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> shall you see <S%G1227><s%> clearly <S%G1227><s%> to cast <S%G1544><s%> out the mote <S%G2595><s%> out of your brother's <S%G80><s%> eye. <S%G3788><s%>

Give <S%G1325><s%> not that which <S%G3588><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%> to the dogs, <S%G2965><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> you your <S%G5216><s%> pearls <S%G3135><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> swine, <S%G5519><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> they trample <S%G2662><s%> them under <S%G1722><s%> their feet, <S%G4228><s%> and turn <S%G4762><s%> again <S%G4762><s%> and rend <S%G4486><s%> you.
Ask, <S%G154><s%> and it shall be given <S%G1325><s%> you; seek, <S%G2212><s%> and you shall find; <S%G2147><s%> knock, <S%G2925><s%> and it shall be opened <S%G455><s%> to you:
For every <S%G3956><s%> one that asks <S%G154><s%> receives; <S%G2983><s%> and he that seeks <S%G2212><s%> finds; <S%G2147><s%> and to him that knocks <S%G2925><s%> it shall be opened. <S%G455><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is there of you, whom <S%G3739><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> his son <S%G5207><s%> ask <S%G154><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> will he give <S%G1929><s%> him a stone? <S%G3037><s%>
Or <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he ask <S%G154><s%> a fish, <S%G2486><s%> will he give <S%G1929><s%> him a serpent? <S%G3789><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> you then, <S%G3767><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> evil, <S%G4190><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> how to give <S%G1325><s%> good <S%G18><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven <S%G3772><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> good <S%G18><s%> things to them that ask <S%G154><s%> him?

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things whatever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> you would <S%G2309><s%> that men <S%G444><s%> should do <S%G4160><s%> to you, do <S%G4160><s%> you even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> to them: for this <S%G3778><s%> is the law <S%G3551><s%> and the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

Enter <S%G1525><s%> you in at <S%G1223><s%> the strait <S%G4728><s%> gate: <S%G4439><s%> for wide <S%G4116><s%> is the gate, <S%G4439><s%> and broad <S%G2149><s%> is the way, <S%G3598><s%> that leads <S%G520><s%> to destruction, <S%G684><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> there be which <S%G3588><s%> go <S%G1525><s%> in thereat: <S%G1223><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> strait <S%G4728><s%> is the gate, <S%G4439><s%> and narrow <S%G2346><s%> is the way, <S%G3598><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> leads <S%G520><s%> to life, <S%G2222><s%> and few <S%G3641><s%> there be that find <S%G2147><s%> it.

Beware <S%G4337><s%> of false <S%G5578><s%> prophets, <S%G5578><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to you in sheep's <S%G4263><s%> clothing, <S%G1742><s%> but inwardly <S%G2081><s%> they are ravening <S%G727><s%> wolves. <S%G3074><s%>

You shall know <S%G1921><s%> them by their fruits. <S%G2590><s%> Do men gather <S%G4816><s%> grapes <S%G4718><s%> of thorns, <S%G173><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> figs <S%G4810><s%> of thistles? <S%G5146><s%>

Even so <S%G3779><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> brings <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit; <S%G2590><s%> but a corrupt <S%G4550><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> brings <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

A good <S%G18><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> bring <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> can a corrupt <S%G4550><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> bring <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> that brings <S%G4160><s%> not forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> is hewn <S%G1581><s%> down, <S%G1581><s%> and cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the fire. <S%G4442><s%>
Why <S%G686><s%> <S%G1065><s%> by their fruits <S%G2590><s%> you shall know <S%G1921><s%> them.

Not every <S%G3956><s%> one that said <S%G3004><s%> to me, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> shall enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven; <S%G3772><s%> but he that does <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of my Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Many <S%G4183><s%> will say <S%G2046><s%> to me in that day, <S%G2250><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> have we not prophesied <S%G4395><s%> in your name? <S%G3686><s%> and in your name <S%G3686><s%> have cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils? <S%G1140><s%> and in your name <S%G3686><s%> done <S%G4160><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> wonderful <S%G1411><s%> works?
And then <S%G5119><s%> will I profess <S%G3670><s%> to them, I never <S%G3763><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> you: depart <S%G672><s%> from me, you that work <S%G2038><s%> iniquity. <S%G458><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3748><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> sayings <S%G3056><s%> of mine, <S%G3450><s%> and does <S%G4160><s%> them, I will liken <S%G3666><s%> him to a wise <S%G5429><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> his house <S%G3614><s%> on a rock: <S%G4073><s%>

And the rain <S%G1028><s%> descended, <S%G2597><s%> and the floods <S%G4215><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and the winds <S%G417><s%> blew, <S%G4154><s%> and beat <S%G4363><s%> on that house; <S%G3614><s%> and it fell <S%G4098><s%> not: for it was founded <S%G2311><s%> on a rock. <S%G4073><s%>

And every <S%G3956><s%> one that hears <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> sayings <S%G3056><s%> of mine, <S%G3450><s%> and does <S%G4160><s%> them not, shall be likened <S%G3666><s%> to a foolish <S%G3474><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> his house <S%G3614><s%> on the sand: <S%G285><s%>

And the rain <S%G1028><s%> descended, <S%G2597><s%> and the floods <S%G4215><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and the winds <S%G417><s%> blew, <S%G4154><s%> and beat <S%G4350><s%> on that house; <S%G3614><s%> and it fell: <S%G4098><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> was the fall <S%G4431><s%> of it.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had ended <S%G4931><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> sayings, <S%G3056><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his doctrine: <S%G1322><s%>
For he taught <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> them as one having <S%G2192><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> and not as the scribes. <S%G1122><s%>
